Hi,
I am a newbie to JUnit and my company uses automatic build to run 
test cases written in Junit for each java class. But, we are not 
testing EJBs currently as it would involve creating .ear file and 
testing. So, can anybody tell me what is the best way to test Entity, 
session and message beans and servlets? Is there anyway to test JSPs?
Any samples/links provided will be much appreciated.
Thanks.
